item.title: Install deal.II on Ubuntu using Docker
item.description: What is deal.II? deal.II1 is an open source software library written in C++ for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) using the finite element method (FEM). It provides a comprehensive set of tools for solving complex PDEs arising in various fields, including fluid dynamics, solid mechanics, electromagnetics, and quantum mechanics. It is designed to be flexible, efficient, and scalable, supporting parallel computing on a wide range of architectures. The library provides a high-level interface for generating meshes, defining finite element spaces, assembling and solving linear systems, and post-processing and visualizing solutions.
